outputs.output_descr: Civil Society in South Sudan is relatively under-developed in comparison to civil society groupings in the sub-region. International engagement with South Sudan civil society has also been limited in scope and depth. Civil Society regulation in South Sudan remains ambiguous. Like the CSO sector, the Media continues to be governed by regressive laws. The project strengthens the oversight and accountability architecture within government, and enhanced capacity of civil society and the media to exercise their voice and influence in national discourse on development policy and governance processes.

project_descr: Increased confidence in the legitimacy and capability of the government and its' representatives to transparently allocate, and account for public resources; and to effectively deliver development results in favor of the citizens of South Sudan.
